English.Text: Unfortunately, it's a pretty even contest. As you stalk around to the promenade behind the casino, you are hit by a warm riviera breeze and the sight of exotic palms. The doorman on this side looks muscular, at least compared to you. You take a swing at him, catching him by surprise, but he comes back hard, and a scuffle develops. "I yield," he says finally. Dusting yourself off, you take his plain black eye mask to cover your black eyes and bloody nose, and shamble into the casino. Once inside, you debate your best bet for finding the Queen.
